short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learning Chinese or Japanese? Replace your new tab page with a personal learning page featuring one new character everyday.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Achieve your goals and start accumulating today!

• A new frequently used word everyday
• Mandarin, Cantonese and Japanese phonetic and voice pronunciations
• Beautiful background photos

0.1.11
• Hide/show word meaning

0.1.10
• Hide/show pronunciations 

0.1.9
• Improved load times
• Option to disable background
• Copy characters with right click

ABOUT/FEATURES
• Just released, currently in Beta
• Option to select either simplified or traditional as the main character
• Select characters by HSK/frequency
• Voiced pronunciation currently relies on Chrome TTS, which requires the web
• Clock function
• Planning to add to-do list, weather soon™
• Would love feedback (feedback@accumulate.today)
